template.name: ILO ProLiant DL380p Gen8
template.description:
Zabbix monitoring template about ILO ProLiant DL380p Gen8. This template controls CPU, RAM banks, temperature and disks status.
By Federico Coppola

item.name: CPU One Status
item.description: Status CPU One If the status is different from 2 there is problem

item.name: CPU Two Status
item.description: Status CPU Two If the status is different from 2 there is problem

item.name: Fan Five Status
item.description: Status Fan Five Status = 2 is OK Status = 3 is degrade Status = 4 is faulty

item.name: Fan Four Status
item.description: Status Fan Four Status = 2 is OK Status = 3 is degrade Status = 4 is faulty

item.name: Fan One Status
item.description: Status Fan One Status = 2 is OK Status = 3 is degrade Status = 4 is faulty

item.name: Fan Six Status
item.description: Status Fan Six Status = 2 is OK Status = 3 is degrade Status = 4 is faulty

item.name: Fan Three Status
item.description: Status Fan Three Status = 2 is OK Status = 3 is degrade Status = 4 is faulty

item.name: Fan Two Status
item.description: Status Fan Two Status = 2 is OK Status = 3 is degrade Status = 4 is faulty

trigger.name: CPU One Degraded
trigger.description: Allert CPU One degraded You can need to replace it

trigger.name: CPU One Faulty
trigger.description: Allert CPU One faulty or damaged You must replace it

trigger.name: CPU Two Degraded
trigger.description: Allert CPU Two degraded You can need to replace it

trigger.name: CPU Two Faulty
trigger.description: Allert CPU Two faulty or damaged You must replace it

trigger.name: Critical CPU One Temperature
trigger.description: Temperature CPU One during the last 5 minute

trigger.name: Critical CPU Two Temperature
trigger.description: Temperature CPU Two during the last 5 minute

trigger.name: Critical ILO Zone Temperature
trigger.description: Temperature ILO Zone during the last 5 minute

trigger.name: Critical Inlet Temperature
trigger.description: Critial Last Internal temperature

trigger.name: Dangerous CPU One Temperature
trigger.description: Temperature of CPU one during the last 5 minute is too high, check the cooling system.

trigger.name: Dangerous CPU Two Temperature
trigger.description: Temperature of CPU one during the last 5 minute is too high, check the cooling system.

trigger.name: Dangerous Critical Inlet Temperature
trigger.description: The Internal temperature is too high and it could be dangerous on average during the last 5 minutes, so check the cooling system.

trigger.name: Dangerous ILO Zone Temperature
trigger.description: Temperature ILO Zone during the last 5 minute s too high, check the cooling system.

trigger.name: Fan Five Degraded
trigger.description: Fan number five is degraed, you can need to replace it

trigger.name: Fan Five Faulty
trigger.description: Fan number five is faulty, you must replace it

trigger.name: Fan Four Degraded
trigger.description: Fan number four is degraded, you can need to replace it

trigger.name: Fan Four Faulty
trigger.description: Fan number five is degraded, you must replace it

trigger.name: Fan One Degraded
trigger.description: Fan number one degraded, you can need to replace it

trigger.name: Fan One Faulty
trigger.description: Fan number one is faulty, replace it

trigger.name: Fan Six Damaged
trigger.description: Fan number six is damaged, you can need to replace it

trigger.name: Fan Six Faulty
trigger.description: Fan number six is faulty, you must replace it

trigger.name: Fan Three Degraded
trigger.description: Fan number three degraded, you can need to replace it

trigger.name: Fan Three Faulty
trigger.description: Fan number three faulty , you must replace it

trigger.name: Fan Two Degraded
trigger.description: Fan number two is degraed, you can need to replace it

trigger.name: Fan Two Faulty
trigger.description: Fan number two is faulty, you must replace it

trigger.name: Mind the disk number eight it is degraded
trigger.description:
Disk Seven is degraded in the last 10 minutes
2=Ok 3=Failed 4=Predictive Failure

trigger.name: Mind the disk number eight it is failed
trigger.description:
Disk Seven is faulty in the last minute
2=Ok 3=Failed 4=Predictive Failure

trigger.expression: {ILO ProLiant DL380p Gen8:status.ram.one.last(,1h)}=11 or {ILO ProLiant DL380p Gen8:status.ram.two.last(,1h)}=11 or {ILO ProLiant DL380p Gen8:status.ram.three.last(,1h)}=11 or {ILO ProLiant DL380p Gen8:status.ram.four.last(,1h)}=11 or {ILO ProLiant DL380p Gen8:status.ram.six.last(,1h)}=11 or {ILO ProLiant DL380p Gen8:status.ram.seventeen.last(,1h)}=11 or {ILO ProLiant DL380p Gen8:status.ram.eight.last(,1h)}=11 or {ILO ProLiant DL380p Gen8:status.ram.nine.last(,1h)}=11 or {ILO ProLiant DL380p Gen8:status.ram.ten.last(,1h)}=11 or {ILO ProLiant DL380p Gen8:status.ram.twelve.last(,1h)}=11 or {ILO ProLiant DL380p Gen8:status.ram.sixteen.last(,1h)}=11 or {ILO ProLiant DL380p Gen8:status.ram.twenty.last(,1h)}=11 or {ILO ProLiant DL380p Gen8:status.ram.twentyone.last(,1h)}=11 or {ILO ProLiant DL380p Gen8:status.ram.twentytwo.last(,1h)}=11 or {ILO ProLiant DL380p Gen8:status.ram.thirteen.last(,1h)}=11 or {ILO ProLiant DL380p Gen8:status.ram.nineteen.last(,1h)}=11 or {ILO ProLiant DL380p Gen8:status.ram.five.last(,1h)}=11 or {ILO ProLiant DL380p Gen8:status.ram.eleven.last(,1h)}=11 or {ILO ProLiant DL380p Gen8:status.ram.eighteen.last(,1h)}=11
trigger.name: Mind the RAM status, a RAM bank or more could be degraded
trigger.description: General status RAM Banks of HP Server
